headline: A Look At Public Service Enterprise Group’s Valuation After Wells Fargo Upgrade And Long Island Contract Extension
summary: Public Service Enterprise Group (PEG) has drawn fresh attention after Wells Fargo cited a favorable risk profile, highlighting the extended Long Island Power Authority contract and tighter 2025 earnings guidance toward the upper end of management’s adjusted EPS range. See our latest analysis for Public Service Enterprise Group. Recent announcements around the Long Island Power Authority contract extension, upcoming earnings, and board refresh with Geisha J. Williams have come against a softer...

headline: PSEG Staffers Help Nearly 50 Teens at Oasis - a Haven for Women and Children in Paterson, NJ

headline: How PSEG’s LIPA Extension and Board Addition Could Shape Public Service Enterprise Group (PEG) Investors
summary: Public Service Enterprise Group announced that industry veteran Geisha J. Williams will join its Board of Directors on March 1, 2026, while also securing a contract extension to operate the Long Island Power Authority grid through December 31, 2030. Together with an analyst upgrade citing low-risk fundamentals and no expected 2026 rate case, these moves highlight PSEG’s emphasis on governance depth and operational stability. We’ll now examine how the Long Island contract extension and...
